name: webapp-weather
description: A "vanilla" JS application on web to show weather of a particular city. This version uses [Halfmoon CSS Framework](https://www.gethalfmoon.com/) for styling and dark mode capabilities. For viewing the classic version please visit the [legacy](https://github.com/humble-barnacle001/webapp-weather/tree/legacy) branch.

scripts.start: npm run minify && npm run preview
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:js: for i in $( ls src/js/*.js ); do bi=$(basename $i); minify $i > public_deploy/js/${bi%.js}.min.js; done
scripts.minify:css: for i in $( ls src/css/*.css ); do bi=$(basename $i); minify $i > public_deploy/css/${bi%.css}.min.css; done
